I would adjust my sleep schedule to take advantage of the natural light during the day and sleep during the evening hours. This would allow me to make the most of the daylight and avoid the need for artificial lighting during the evening.
I would experiment with different types of activities to help me relax and unwind in the evening. This could include activities such as reading, meditation, or yoga.
I would consider using a sleep aid or supplement that helps promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.
I would explore alternative sleep environments, such as sleeping outside or in a different room with a different temperature or lighting.
I would try to create a relaxing bedtime routine that includes activities such as taking a warm bath, practicing relaxation techniques, and listening to calming music.
